trans-unit.source: Provides the application directory as evidence for policy evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 提供應用程式目錄，做為原則評估的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The domain host can associate a file directory with an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 檔案目錄可以關聯的網域主機應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The evidence for policy evaluation is provided only when the application domain is associated with a file directory.
trans-unit.target: 只有檔案目錄相關聯的應用程式定義域時，才提供原則評估的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Application code does not need to create instances of this class.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式程式碼不需要建立這個類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The path of the application directory.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的物件目前的執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: A new object that is a copy of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 新的物件，為這個執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new copy of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的複本<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的相同複本<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path of the application directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the application directory.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether instances of the same type of an evidence object are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 決定的辨識項物件相同類型的執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The directory values of the two instances must match exactly.
trans-unit.target: 兩個執行個體的目錄值必須完全符合。

trans-unit.source: Equivalent noncanonical paths are not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 無法解析對等非正式的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For example, C:\app and C:\temp\\...\app are not equal directory values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，C:\app 和 C:\temp\\...\app 不是相同的目錄的值。

trans-unit.source: An object of same type as the current evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 與目前的辨識項物件相同類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two instances are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果兩個執行個體相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code of the current application directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式目錄的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the current application directory.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式目錄雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref> evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 取得狀態的字串表示<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref>辨識項物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful during debugging to get an easy-to-read representation of the object.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得之物件的容易閱讀表示偵錯期間，此方法相當實用。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref> evidence object.
trans-unit.target: 狀態表示<xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationDirectory"></xref>辨識項物件。
